attributes.action: Extend ulez due to loss of earnings due to  Corona causing financial strains
attributes.additional_details: Due to covid 19 causing financial strains on van and commuting workers who cannot afford these charges or new ulez compliant vehicles through this ongoing pandemic.
attributes.background: We want the government to extend the ulez charges to be placed in October 2021 to October 2022

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for the London Assembly and the London Mayor.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions

We could accept a petition calling for the Government to provide funding for motorists affected by ultra low emission zones to replace their vehicles with ultra low emission vehicles.
